item.title: 吉卜力效应推出病毒式功能后，聊天 GPT 的使用率创下新高
item.description: 上周，使用 ChatGPT 图像生成工具创作吉卜力风格人工智能艺术的热潮导致 OpenAI 聊天机器人的用户数量创下历史新高，服务器不堪重负，暂时限制了该功能的使用。【原文：The frenzy to create Ghibli-style AI art using ChatGPT's image-generation tool led to a record surge in users for OpenAI's chatbot last week, straining its servers and temporarily limiting the feature's usage.】

item.title: 美国对越南征收关税将对耐克和其他运动品牌造成打击
item.description: 耐克公司在重振品牌和扭转长期销售下滑的努力中，可能很快会面临又一次打击：美国对从越南进口的商品征收关税。【原文：Nike could soon face another blow in its effort to revive its brand and reverse a long decline in sales: U.S. tariffs on imports from Vietnam.】

item.title: 投资者向欧洲 ETF 投资创纪录的 110 亿美元，以 "让欧洲再次伟大"。
item.description: 贝莱德（BlackRock）的数据显示，第一季度美国投资者向专注于欧洲股票的交易所交易基金投入了创纪录的 106 亿美元，是去年同期流入量的七倍。【原文：U.S. investors poured a record $10.6 billion into exchange-traded funds focused on European stocks in the first quarter, seven times the inflows recorded a year earlier, according to data from BlackRock .】

item.title: 福特第一季度美国汽车销量下降 1.3
item.description: 福特汽车公司周二公布，受部分车型停产和某些租赁车队销售时机的影响，第一季度美国汽车销量下降了 1.3%。【原文：Ford Motor reported a 1.3% drop in first-quarter U.S. sales on Tuesday, hit by the discontinuation of some models and the timing of certain rental fleet sales.】

item.title: Michael Kors 所有者卡普里首席财务官爱德华兹加盟梅西百货担任财务主管
item.description: 卡普里控股公司的财务总监托马斯-爱德华兹（Thomas Edwards）将离开公司，加盟连锁百货公司梅西百货公司（Macy's）担任首席财务官。【原文：Capri Holdings's finance chief Thomas Edwards will leave the company to join department store chain Macy's as its chief financial officer.】

item.title: Cerebras Systems 和 Ranovus 赢得美国军方 4500 万美元的交易，用于加速芯片连接
item.description: 总部位于硅谷的人工智能芯片公司 Cerebras Systems 和加拿大芯片初创公司 Ranovus 周二表示，它们已获得美国军方价值 4500 万美元的合同，以加速计算芯片之间的连接。【原文：Cerebras Systems, a Silicon Valley-based AI chip company, and Canadian chip startup Ranovus said on Tuesday that they had been awarded a $45 million contract from the U.S. military to speed up connections between computing chips.】

item.title: 高通公司考虑收购英国 Alphawave 公司
item.description: 芯片制造商高通公司（Qualcomm）周二表示，正在考虑收购英国 Alphawave IP Group 公司。【原文：Chipmaker Qualcomm said on Tuesday it is considering making an offer to acquire UK-based Alphawave IP Group .】

item.title: 沃尔什表示，即将到来的贸易关税尚未打击航班需求
item.description: 全球航空机构国际航空运输协会（IATA）的负责人表示，美国威胁征收贸易关税不太可能阻止COVID之后旅游需求的激增，唐纳德-特朗普总统的做法最终可能会对航空业产生积极影响。【原文：The head of global airlines body IATA said threatened U.S. trade tariffs were unlikely to halt a post-COVID surge in travel demand, and that President Donald Trump's approach could ultimately be positive for the industry.】

item.title: Roblox 宣布采用新广告格式，与谷歌合作促进广告业务发展
item.description: Roblox 周二在其游戏平台上推出了一种新的视频广告形式，并宣布与谷歌建立合作伙伴关系，以帮助促进其新兴广告业务的增长。【原文：Roblox on Tuesday launched a new format of video advertising on its gaming platform and announced a partnership with Google to help boost the growth of its nascent ad business.】

item.title: 特斯拉因马斯克的右翼活动而成为破坏目标
item.description: 由于首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的右翼激进主义，特斯拉汽车、基础设施和办公室在多个国家成为破坏目标。【原文：Tesla cars, infrastructures and offices have become targets of vandalism in several countries in response to CEO Elon Musk's right-wing activism.】

item.title: 智利 Codelco 公司同意从日本 JBIC 和商业银行获得 6.66 亿美元贷款
item.description: 世界最大的铜生产商、智利国营企业 Codelco 周二表示，该公司同意从日本国际合作银行获得 4.66 亿美元贷款，并与一家商业银行共同出资获得另外 2 亿美元贷款。【原文：Chile's state-run Codelco, the world's largest copper producer, said on Tuesday it agreed on a $466 million loan from the Japan Bank for International Cooperation and an additional $200 million loan co-financed with a commercial bank.】

item.title: 美元前景更加低迷，但关税问题令市场情绪低落：路透调查
item.description: 路透社对外汇策略师进行的一项调查显示，尽管对唐纳德-特朗普总统反复无常的关税声明所带来的经济影响的担忧与日俱增，但预计美元在未来几个月内将趋于稳定。【原文：The U.S. dollar is forecast to stabilize over the coming months despite mounting worries about the economic impact of President Donald Trump’s erratic tariff announcements, according to a Reuters survey of FX strategists.】

item.title: 受特朗普影响，WTO潜心谋划未来
item.description: 世界贸易组织希望在日内瓦湖畔的光滑总部静静地度过特朗普政府关税的余震，因为特朗普政府的保护主义意图与其自由贸易的使命背道而驰。【原文：From its sleek headquarters on the shores of Lake Geneva, the World Trade Organization hopes to quietly ride out the after-shocks of Trump administration tariffs whose protectionist intent runs in the face of its free-trade mandate.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发全球顶级企业第一季度市值大跌
item.description: 2025 年第一季度，受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收关税的影响，全球顶级企业的市值出现了近三年来最大的季度缩水，这加剧了人们对美国经济衰退的担忧。【原文：Top global corporations experienced the largest quarterly erosion of market values in nearly three years in the first quarter of 2025, hit by tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump, which are fuelling heightened concerns of a U.S. recession.】

item.title: 西班牙三月份特斯拉新车销量上升，第一季度销量下降
item.description: 行业组织ANFAC周二公布的登记数据显示，特斯拉3月份的新车销量比2024年同期增长了34%，达到1983辆，尽管该公司整个季度的销量下降了12%。【原文：Tesla's new car sales rose 34% in March from the same month in 2024 to 1.983, registration data released by industry group ANFAC showed on Tuesday, though the company's sales during the whole quarter fell 12%.】

item.title: 法官驳回100亿美元滑石粉和解协议后，J&J股价下跌
item.description: 强生公司周二股价下跌超过 3%，此前美国破产法官驳回了该公司提出的 100 亿美元方案，该方案旨在终止数万起指控其婴儿爽身粉和其他滑石粉产品导致卵巢癌的诉讼。【原文：Johnson & Johnson shares fell more than 3% on Tuesday after a U.S. bankruptcy judge rejected its $10 billion proposal to end tens of thousands of lawsuits alleging that its baby powder and other talc products cause ovarian cancer.】

item.title: 有线电视新闻频道 Newsmax 在纽约证交所强势上市一天后跳涨
item.description: 周二收盘前，保守派新闻媒体 Newsmax 的股价大涨超过 18%，延续了其在纽约证券交易所惊艳亮相一天后的涨势。【原文：Shares of conservative news outlet Newsmax jumped over 18% before the bell on Tuesday, extending the stock's gains a day after its stunning debut on the New York Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 美国 新的季度，同样的问题
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: KKR 合作伙伴称基金正在分析 FiberCop 与 Open Fiber 的合作关系
item.description: KKR 合伙人阿尔贝托-西格诺里（Alberto Signori）周二在米兰举行的会议上表示，作为意大利光纤网络运营商 FiberCop 的主要股东，美国基金 KKR 正在分析与意大利 Open Fiber 合作的可能性，这是政府建立单一宽带网络计划的一部分。【原文：U.S. fund KKR , the main shareholder in Italian fibre optic grid operator FiberCop, is analysing a possible tie-up with Italy's Open Fiber as part of a broader government plan to create a single broadband network, KKR Partner Alberto Signori said at conference in Milan on Tuesday.】

item.title: 拜耳希望今年推出缓解更年期症状的药物和心脏病药物
item.description: 拜耳公司周二表示，该公司正准备在今年向市场推出两种新药，每种新药的年峰值销售额至少可达 10 亿美元。【原文：Bayer said on Tuesday it was preparing market launches this year of two new drugs that could each have annual peak sales of at least $1 billion, as it seeks to strengthen its pharmaceuticals business amid a high debt burden.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税迫在眉睫，阿根廷在华盛顿寻求贸易协议
item.description: 阿根廷外长将于周二会见美国国务卿马可-鲁比奥，此行旨在为两国之间的贸易协议奠定初步基础，即使美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正准备征收全面关税。【原文：Argentina's foreign minister will meet U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio on Tuesday in a trip aimed at laying the initial groundwork for a trade deal between the two nations, even as President Donald Trump prepares to impose sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 代理顾问 ISS 敦促对高盛首席执行官和首席运营官的留任奖金投反对票
item.description: 机构股东服务公司（Institutional Shareholder Services）建议高盛投资者拒绝接受董事会向两位高管发放一次性奖励的决定，成为第二家这样做的著名代理顾问公司。【原文：Institutional Shareholder Services has advised Goldman Sachs investors to reject the board's decision to grant one-time awards to its top two executives, becoming the second prominent proxy adviser to do so.】

item.title: 波音否认 737 MAX 喷气机生产出现波动
item.description: 波音公司周二否认了媒体关于 737 MAX 产量波动的报道，称今年迄今为止每月产量未达到 38 架，最近产量也没有下降。【原文：Boeing on Tuesday denied a media report of fluctuations in 737 MAX production, saying that output had not reached 38 per month so far this year and nor had production recently fallen.】

item.title: 特斯拉第一季度在荷兰的销量下降近 50
item.description: 本周二的数据显示，2025 年第一季度特斯拉在荷兰的销量几乎比去年同期减少了一半。【原文：Tesla's sales in the Netherlands almost halved in the first quarter of 2025 from the year earlier period, data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 投资者关注关税风险，期货价格下滑
item.description: 美国股指期货周二下滑，标志着新季度的黯淡开局，因为投资者正努力应对特朗普政府将于周三宣布的全面新关税的不确定性。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Tuesday, marking a gloomy start to the new quarter, as investors grappled with uncertainty around the Trump administration's sweeping new tariffs set to be announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国卢克希尔正考虑今年在香港上市
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士称，苹果 AirPods 的制造商中国立思辰精密工业公司正在考虑今年在香港上市，这为近期中国内地上市公司纷纷考虑在香港上市的情况再添一例。【原文：China's Luxshare Precision Industry , maker of Apple AirPods, is considering a Hong Kong listing this year, three people familiar with the matter said, adding to a recent run of mainland China-listed companies eyeing a Hong Kong float.】

item.title: 关税预示美国第一季度汽车销量将小幅增长
item.description: 本周二，美国汽车制造商的数据将显示，由于需求稳定，今年前三个月美国汽车销量可能有所上升，同时该行业正在为唐纳德-特朗普总统最新关税政策的影响做准备。【原文：U.S. auto sales likely inched higher in the first three months of the year on steady demand, data from the carmakers will show on Tuesday, as the industry braces for the fallout of President Donald Trump's latest tariffs.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称制药业游说特朗普分阶段征收关税
item.description: 据四位熟悉讨论情况的消息人士透露，制药商正在游说美国总统唐纳德-特朗普分阶段对进口医药产品征收关税，希望减少关税带来的冲击，并留出时间转移生产。【原文：Drugmakers are lobbying U.S. President Donald Trump to phase in tariffs on imported pharmaceutical products in hopes of reducing the sting from the charges and to allow time to shift manufacturing, according to four sources familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 据《华盛顿邮报》报道，特朗普的助手起草了一份提案，要求对大部分进口到美国的商品征收至少 20% 的关税
item.description: 据《华盛顿邮报》周二报道，白宫助手起草了一份提案，拟对大部分进口到美国的商品征收约 20% 的关税。【原文：White House aides have drafted a proposal to impose tariffs of around 20% on most imports to the United States, the Washington Post reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 律师事务所聘请前特斯拉律师和顶级保守派诉讼律师参与特朗普之战
item.description: 在特朗普政府以一波行政命令打击美国律师事务所之际，三家挑战这些命令的律师事务所聘请了特斯拉前总法律顾问、长期保守派诉讼律师和其他顶级律师作为他们的代表。【原文：As the Trump administration strikes at U.S. law firms with a wave of executive orders, three firms challenging those orders have retained a former Tesla general counsel, a longtime conservative litigator and other top lawyers to represent them.】
